Activity: Review emails and yesterday's progress report. Check the status of the combat system bug fixes.
Initial playtesting of the economy system integration with @QTest-1. Focus on identifying balance issues and ensuring that rewards are appropriate for the difficulty of the encounters.
Analyze the playtesting feedback and prioritize balance adjustments. Adjust reward tables to ensure a smooth and engaging player progression curve. Email to @LDes-1 and @QTest-1 about the adjustment.

Begin working on implementing core gameplay features: quests. Review the narrative design documents provided by @NDes-1 (Narrative Designer) and identify the technical requirements for implementing quests.

Meeting with @NDes-1 and @Lvdn-1 (Level Designer) to discuss the integration of quests into the game world. Define quest triggers, objectives, and rewards. Clarify how quests will interact with the combat and economy systems.
Lunch break. Browse Reddit for the latest game updates.

Implement the quest system. Focus on creating a basic quest framework that can handle different types of quests (e.g., fetch quests, kill quests, escort quests). Write code to track quest progress and award rewards upon completion.

Collaborate with @Tart-1 (Technical Artist) to design visual cues for quests (e.g., quest markers, objective indicators). Ensure that these visual cues are clear, intuitive, and consistent with the game's art style.
Document the quest system implementation, including API documentation and data flow diagrams. Prepare for initial testing tomorrow.
Review progress, update task list, and prepare a brief summary email to @LDes-1 and @Prod-1 outlining completed tasks and planned activities for tomorrow.
